author: felicity
msg: bug 3482: having the children reset the signal handling removed perl-internal signal handles as well, such as __WARN__, which broke the debug output.  we now explicitly only reset the signals that we changed in the parent via 2 new functions in spamd where all the signal handling should happen.

author: felicity
msg: bug 3490: spamd wasn't warning if the pidfile or socket was failing to be removed during a restart

author: brondsem
msg: Date keyword isn't necessary; if we want it back, we have to enable it via svn:keywords property
